release.change: Added Esperanto and Dutch (thx Robin van der Vliet).
Fix bug with floating windows (thx diogopereira)
Limit undo button to last 50 states to avoid using too much memory.
Added undo button (thx to fraggerfox on github)
Rebuilt apk with new build tools.
Added German, Spanish, Polish, Serbian translations thx to contributors in github
Added greek and french app translation, minor build improvements.
